description:
Population Raster Niue 2020
Data Input: Household locations from Open Street Maps - HOSM Niue Building footprint. https://data.humdata.org/dataset/hotosm_niu_buildings
Population allocated proportionally using 2011 census population counts at enumeration area level.
Year Population Growth Rate of 0.76% has been applied to update population up to 2020
The human settlement footprint with census population allocated has been converted into a 100 m resolution raster.
name: Niue_Population_Grid_2020
